short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JustRecap extracts summaries and key moments from videos, so that you learn more in less time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time and enhance learning with the Reccap Chrome extension! This extension allows you to get bite-sized text summaries and visual key moments extracted automatically from videos right in your browser.

Reccap analyzes videos and generates shareable articles with the key ideas and takeaways. No more wasting hours watching lengthy videos or lectures - with Reccap you can grasp the core concepts in just minutes.

Key Features:

- Get summarized articles and key moments extracted from videos with just one click
- Retain more by pairing summarized text with visual frames highlighting key points
- Seamlessly switch between reading and watching to suit your learning style
- Focus on what matters most with a consolidated set of concise takeaways
- Enjoy more efficient learning and get to the core faster with the Reccap Chrome extension!
